availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, saddler. Kentucky native. Married to Ann Margaret Freeman Savage. Father of William Savage, Mary M. Savage, and Charles F. Savage. Saddler in Marion County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Marion County in 1850. Saddler in Marion County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, p. 334A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, City/District.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, Lebanon District 1, p. 44.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994047, Marion County Births.
